div.div: üé® style(index.html): reformat introduction section and experience section The introduction section now has a container-fluid class to improve its layout. The experience section has been reformatted to have a margin of 1rem on the top and bottom and 4rem on the left and right. The text is now aligned to the left.

üé® style(about.html, index.html): update footer container to fluid container The footer container in both about.html and index.html has been updated to a fluid container to improve the layout and spacing of the footer elements.
üé® style(mission.html): add padding and make footer container fluid üé® style(main.css): adjust margin and float of keys in footer The footer container in mission.html now has a fluid layout and a padding of 3 units. The keys in the footer now have a margin-bottom of 2 units and are floated to the right. These changes improve the layout and spacing of the footer.
üé® style(main.css): add margin to .site-footer .keys This change adds a margin of 1rem to the .site-footer .keys class, which improves the spacing and layout of the footer section.

üìù chore(mission.html): fix typo and center image üíÑ style(mission.html): improve readability and aesthetics The typo in the mission statement has been fixed. The image in the second section is now centered using the justify-content-center class. These changes improve the readability and aesthetics of the page.

üé® style(mission.html): add code class to 404 page container üé® style(code.css): increase font size of code class The code class is added to the container of the 404 page to allow for more specific styling. The font size of the code class is increased to 1.5rem to improve readability.

üé® style(about.html): format and restructure text for better readability The changes made to the about.html file include formatting and restructuring the text to improve readability. The changes include adding line breaks, indentations, and adjusting the length of some lines to fit within the recommended 74 characters limit. These changes do not affect the content of the file but make it easier to read and understand.
üé® style(about.html): format and rephrase paragraphs for better readability The changes made in this commit are purely cosmetic. The paragraphs in the about.html file have been reformatted to improve readability. The text has been broken down into smaller paragraphs, and some sentences have been rephrased to make them easier to understand. The changes made do not affect the content of the page.
üé® style(about.html): reformat code and add whitespace for readability This commit reformats the code in the about.html file to improve readability. The code is now properly indented and whitespace has been added to separate the different sections of the file.

üîÑ chore(index.html): reword and restructure introduction paragraph ‚ú® feat(index.html): add more content to the introduction paragraph The introduction paragraph has been reworded and restructured to better convey the message of the text. More content has been added to the paragraph to emphasize the power of technology and its impact on our lives. The paragraph now highlights the younger generation's role in driving technological advancements and the unprecedented pace of progress that technology has brought about. It also emphasizes the potential of technology to connect people and cultures from around the world and improve our lives in countless ways. The paragraph concludes by envisioning a future that goes beyond mere technological advancement and empowers us to live a life filled with abundance, freedom, and purpose.

üé® style(about.html): rewrite content for clarity and conciseness The content of the about.html file has been rewritten to improve clarity and conciseness. The language has been simplified and rephrased to make it more accessible to a wider audience. The changes include rewording sentences, removing unnecessary information, and breaking up long paragraphs into shorter ones. The goal of these changes is to make the content more engaging and easier to read, while still conveying the same message.

üé® style(about.html): reformat HTML and update footer text The HTML code has been reformatted to improve readability and consistency. The footer text has been updated to reflect the current year and the author's name.
üìù chore(index.html): rewrite paragraphs for clarity and conciseness The paragraphs have been rewritten to improve clarity and conciseness. The changes aim to make the text more engaging and easier to read. The new text highlights the limitless opportunities in the technology sector and the impact of technology on our lives. The text also acknowledges the pioneers of the tech industry who have made significant contributions to the field.
üîç chore(mission.html): improve readability and add more details to text This commit improves the readability of the mission.html file by adding line breaks and reformatting some of the text. Additionally, it adds more details to the text to provide a more comprehensive overview of the benefits of web development and Flask. The changes include:
- Adding more details to the "Why Web Development" section, including examples of how web-based tools and platforms can be used to enhance collaboration and productivity. - Adding more details to the "Why I Want to Master Flask" section, including information on Flask's lightweight and easy-to-use nature, its wide range of features, and its high customizability. The section also includes information on the career opportunities that mastering Flask can provide.
üìù docs(mission.html): update content of The Goal for Learning Babel and Mixing in Fullstack React sections The changes made to the mission.html file include updating the content of The Goal for Learning Babel and Mixing in Fullstack React sections. The updated content provides a more comprehensive and detailed explanation of the benefits of learning Babel and React. The changes aim to help readers understand the importance of these tools in web development and how they can enhance their career prospects by mastering them.
üìù chore(mission.html): rewrite mission statement for clarity and conciseness The mission statement has been rewritten to improve clarity and conciseness. The language has been simplified, and the sentences have been rephrased to make them more readable. The changes aim to make the statement more impactful and engaging to the reader.
üé® style(css): adjust height of mission cloud and remove min-height from body The height of the mission cloud has been increased from 150px to 250px to better accommodate the content. The min-height property has been removed from the body to prevent unnecessary scrolling.
